You visit Japan. You have a friend named Sakura. She gave a smartphone to you. You keep in touch with her on facebook and promise to meet her. She likes sports especially catch and she often posts sports pictures. And you know today is her birth day!!
Hi, how are you doing?? Welcome to Japan!! I guess you don't know what day it is today…..
Hi, I’m fine. Of course I know!! It’s your birthday, right?? Happy birthday!!
Sorry, I don’t know anything… What day is it today??
Yeah!! Why do you know that?! But thanks, I’m so happy!!
Heeeeey It’s my birth day!! Please remember!!
Anyway, where are we going today??
Let’s have a cup of coffee!!
Let’s play catch!!
Hey!! It’s so fun!! I like sports especially catch!!
Actually, I don’t like coffee very much…. I wanted to exercise…
